Chinese Culture

About

Hello there! My name is Zhengji Li, and I will be introducing to you some aspects of Chinese Culture. Chinese culture is one of the world's oldest and most complex cultures, with a rich history that spans over 5,000 years. It has been shaped by various leaders, dynasties, and religions, such as Confucianism, Taoism, and Buddhism. Chinese culture was an important influence on the cultures of other Eastern Asian countries, such as Japan, Korea, and Vietnam. In this presentation, I will be discussing three different aspects of Chinese culture, as well as an artifact that represents Chinese culture as a whole.
